metadata.title: CVE-2023-28320 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in curl <v8.1.0 in the way libcurlprovides several different backends for resolving host names, selected atbuild time. If it is built to use the synchronous resolver, it allows nameresolves to time-out slow operations using `alarm()` and `siglongjmp()`.When doing this, libcurl used a global buffer that was not mutex protectedand a multi-threaded application might therefore crash or otherwisemisbehave.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
